description: [``botocore``] This release adds the SourceIdentity parameter that can be set when assuming a role.
[``botocore``] The InferICD10CM API now returns TIME_EXPRESSION entities that refer to medical conditions.
[``botocore``] Clarify that enabling or disabling automated backups causes a brief downtime, not an outage.
[``botocore``] Added support to enable AQUA in Amazon Redshift clusters.
